ygData.subject: Re: The Light of the Flame!
ygData.msgSnippet: As the cells opened, Tucson found himself free as well, and finally gets himself out of the cell, thanks to Rodimus.  At last, he finally knocked some sense

As the cells opened, Tucson found himself free as well, and finally gets hi=
mself out of the cell, thanks to Rodimus.  At last, he finally knocked some=
 sense into him.  He follows his comrade's signature until he arrives at hi=
s side.  

"About time you listened to reason.  Welcome back.  Oh, by the w=
ay, be prepared, Nightshift and Rat Trap may not be so accepting upon your =
return. Anyway, we have to find Nightlight and Darkhawk, who is really Wind=
lord.  I suggest you find Nightlight, I find Windlord and we get the pit ou=
t of here as fast as we can.  If we get separated, meet me outside the fort=
ress by the front fascade, you'll know who to look for, big, silver missile=
 truck, that's me."  

Outside Rat Trap gets the com link.  And as Tucson P=
rime would have suspected, he blows his stack, upon hearing Rodimus's words=
.

"Grrrrrr!  WHERE THE PIT HAVE YA BEEN ALL THIS TIME SPEEDY HUH?!  WORKN'=
 FOR HYDRAS WERE WE?!  ABOUT SLAGGN' TIME YA SNAPPED OUTA YOUR LITTLE TRANC=
E PAL! AND BY THE WAY, I'M MAD BECAUSE YOU HAD THE NERVE TA SLAG WHEELS WHE=
N HE WAS JUST TRYN' TA HELP YA! SOME FRIEND YOU'RE TURN'N OUT TA BE!  C'mon=
 Quickstride, let's get back ta the ark.  I feel better now that I blew off=
 some much needed steam."

Tucson could hear Rat Trap through his com link.=
  He glances back to Rodimus one last time.

" Err, I'll - see what I can d=
o to resolve this little issue.. Like I said, it could take some time."

He=
 then opens his com link to Rat Trap.

"Rat Trap, it's me, Tucson Prime, I'=
m all right little guy, and believe it or not, Rodimus is responsible for m=
y jailbreak.  We'll see you guys soon, okay?

Rat Trap responds.

" You got=
 it Wheels, I almost thought you were done for."

In his cell, Nightshift j=
oins up with Kup, and gets Rodimus's com link too.  Like Rat Trap, he also =
shows some signs of being a slight displeased about his recent alliance wit=
h Hydras.

" I wonder how long this is gonna last before he falls for anoth=
er one of Hydra's scemes?  I dunno about you Kup, but as far as I'm concern=
ed, Tucson Prime's my leader.  This whole thing about Rodimus, still creeps=
 me out."

He replies to Rodimus.

"Nightshift here, I got the memmo. But u=
nless you want me ta be cool with ya, ya gotta prove ta us that ya ain't go=
nna slip through the cracks again, and is this some sorta trick ta put us d=
own even deeper?  I dunno Rodimus, but after this, I kinda don't trust ya. =
 I'll do as told, I ain't gonna disobey, but I'm gonna run those orders thr=
ough Tucson Prime first, since he's been able ta resist this slag ball's sc=
heme with no problem.  He never quit on you and I ain't never gonna quit on=
 him.  This is Nightshift, peace out."

He replies his last phrase with a c=
ool tone of voice.

"Yeah right, two years he serves Hydras, and all of a s=
udden he's all high'n mighty again.  Yo, Tucson Prime, Nightshift here, wha=
t's the next phase of the plan?"

Tucson catches Nightshift's com link.

"N=
ightlight and Windlord still need to be recovered.  Windlord goes by the na=
me of Darkhawk, and it may be difficult to snap him out of his shell progra=
m.  I suggest you proceede with caution, and if you find Darkhawk before I =
do, contact me.  Don't try to handle him yourself, he may be rather crafty.=
"

Nightshift nodds.

"Gotchya."

Tucson Prime senses a cool tone in his co=
mrade's voice.

"Nightshift, are you all right? You seem a bit disturbed."
=

Nightshift replies.

" I dunno sir, I hate ta say this but I dunno if I ca=
n trust Rodimus after two years of him workn' for the enemy.  I can't trust=
 someone who's turned his back on his faction, it just ain't right.  And no=
w he acts all high'n mighty.  What next?  He's gonna turn his spoiler on us=
 'n really slag us good?"

Tucson Prime sighs.

"I was afraid of this.  Our=
 return to the Ark is going to be a rocky one. I think a conference will be=
 in order once we get back.  One between all of us.  I know what you're fee=
ling and I can't blame you for your apprehensions, and neither can I blame =
Rat Trap for his. I too wonder why and how, but we have to get past this an=
d at least try to rebuild our alliance with Rodimus who is now trying hard =
to redeem himself."

Night Shift replies.

" I'll try.  But don't expect mi=
racles."

Tucson smiles gently.

"Thanks Nightshift.  I appreciate it.  Now=
, do you have any stasis cuffs available?"

Night Shift takes inventory of =
his restaint supplies.

"One pair."

Tucson looks in his possession as well=
.

" Same here.  All right, actually if you do find Darkhawk, try and get t=
he cuffs on him if you can.  But don't harm him."

Night Shift salutes.

"C=
opy that, Peace out Tucson Prime."

It's not long before Nightshift goes to=
 his duties, as Tucson Prime reaches Kup.

" Kup, I know you're good at kee=
ping the peace.  I have a feeling Rat Trap and Night Shift are still a bit =
steamed off at Rodimus.  You have my permission to break up any squabbles t=
hat might ensue between them."

With his last instruction, Tucson Prime car=
ries out his part of the mission.
